wikipedia_page.main: Charles Harold Hayward (26 April 1898 – 5 July 1998) was an English cabinet maker, editor of The Woodworker magazine, illustrator, and author of numerous books on woodworking. Hayward has been described as "the most important workshop writer and editor of the 20th century".

response: *Charles H. Hayward (1898–1998), English cabinet maker and author
